sect2.title: Snap to Canvas
sect2.para: If this option is enabled, when you move a selection or a layer, they appear to pull on the canvas edges when it approaches. This is useful for accurate placement of image elements.

note.para:
Canvas edges are usually mingled with image edges: the canvas has, then, the same size as the image. But you can change canvas size in
Image Canvas Size .

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
View Snap to Canvas .
